title: multiple return value at global level generates multiple calls
body:
the attached code should only print "foo" once.
it actually prints it three times (the more return values,
the more times).

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

darwin 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
8cc3a6f7ad37+ tip
Attachments: 1. initbug.go (156 bytes)
